definition: a decisive manner of beginning a musical tone or phrase, to begin to injure
details:
noun
- a decisive manner of beginning a musical tone or phrase
= synonyms: tone-beginning
- an offensive move in a sport or game
= example: an offensive move in a sport or game
- the act of attacking
= example: the act of attacking
= synonyms: attempt
- ideas or actions intended to deal with a problem or situation
= synonyms: approach, plan of attack
- (military) an offensive against an enemy (using weapons)
= example: (military) an offensive against an enemy (using weapons)
= synonyms: onslaught
- strong criticism
= example: strong criticism
- intense adverse criticism
= synonyms: blast
- the onset of a corrosive or destructive process (as by a chemical agent)
= example: the onset of a corrosive or destructive process (as by a chemical agent)
- a sudden occurrence of an uncontrollable condition
= example: a sudden occurrence of an uncontrollable condition
verb
- to begin to injure
= example: to begin to injure
- to set to work upon
= example: to set to work upon
- to attack in speech or writing
= example: to attack in speech or writing
= synonyms: snipe
- to take the initiative and go on the offensive
= example: to take the initiative and go on the offensive
= synonyms: aggress
- to launch an attack or assault on
= example: to launch an attack or assault on
= synonyms: assail
- to attack someone physically or emotionally
= example: to attack someone physically or emotionally
= synonyms: assault, assail, set on
